---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or enhancement for the project
title: "Feature: [Short description of feature]"
labels: enhancement, priority-medium, needs-triage
assignees:
---

### Feature Request Process
- Describe the feature you would like to implement clearly
- Explain the use case and benefits this feature will provide
- Outline any potential design considerations or alternatives
- Include examples or mockups if applicable
